titleStmt.title: The Manner of the burning the pope in effigies in London on the 5th of November, 1678 with the manner of carrying him through several streets in progression to Temple-Bar, where at length he was decently burned : also a particular of several bloody massacres done by the papists upon the bodies of English, Irish and French Protestants.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
